References

When using data, figures, or tools shared here, please cite the following:
  • Kiar, Gregory, et al. “ndmg: Neurodata's MRI Graphs Pipeline”. Zenodo, August 15, 2016. doi:10.5281/zenodo.60206.
Previous Pipeline Papers
  • Gray, William R., et al. "Magnetic resonance connectome automated pipeline: an overview." IEEE pulse 3.2 (2012): 42-48.
  • Roncal, William Gray, et al. "MIGRAINE: MRI graph reliability analysis and inference for connectomics." Global Conference on Signal and Information Processing (GlobalSIP), 2013 IEEE.
Related Papers
  • Mhembere, Disa, et al. "Computing scalable multivariate glocal invariants of large (brain-) graphs." Global Conference on Signal and Information Processing (GlobalSIP), 2013 IEEE.
  • Kiar, Gregory, et al. "Science In the Cloud (SIC): A use case in MRI Connectomics." arXiv preprint arXiv:1610.08484 (2016).
